content: You ignore the noise outside and look intently at Shungen, worried about his injuries.
Shungen: Thank you, I'm happy to see you worrying so much about me
Me: Of course! We've grown up together! You used to care about me! Now I care about you!
(Shungen's eyes squint into slits as the sunlight from the window shines through, and I help Shungen back to the classroom after PE
